Blog.post: This should go in the about me section of the blog...shockingly accurate: Profile Summary for the Enneagram Type Four urlLink http://www.enneagraminstitute.com/TypeFour.asp Healthy : Self-aware, introspective, on the "search for self," aware of feelings and inner impulses. Sensitive and intuitive both to self and others: gentle, tactful, compassionate. / Highly personal, individualistic, "true to self." Self-revealing, emotionally honest, humane. Ironic view of self and life: can be serious and funny, vulnerable and emotionally strong. At Their Best: Profoundly creative, expressing the personal and the universal, possibly in a work of art. Inspired, self-renewing and regenerating: able to transform all their experiences into something valuable: self-creative. Average: Take an artistic, romantic orientation to life, creating a beautiful, aesthetic environment to cultivate and prolong personal feelings. Heighten reality through fantasy, passionate feelings, and the imagination. / To stay in touch with feelings, they interiorize everything, taking everything personally, but become self-absorbed and introverted, moody and hypersensitive, shy and self-conscious, unable to be spontaneous or to "get out of themselves." Stay withdrawn to protect their self-image and to buy time to sort out feelings. / Gradually think that they are different from others, and feel that they are exempt from living as everyone else does. They become melancholy dreamers, disdainful, decadent, and sensual, living in a fantasy world. Self-pity and envy of others leads to self-indulgence, and to becoming increasingly impractical, unproductive, effete, and precious. Unhealthy: When dreams fail, become self-inhibiting and angry at self, depressed and alienated from self and others, blocked and emotionally paralyzed. Ashamed of self, fatigued and unable to function. / Tormented by delusional self-contempt, self-reproaches, self-hatred, and morbid thoughts: everything is a source of torment. Blaming others, they drive away anyone who tries to help them. / Despairing, feel hopeless and become self-destructive, possibly abusing alcohol or drugs to escape. In the extreme: emotional breakdown or suicide is likely. Generally corresponds to the Avoidant, Depressive, and Narcissistic personality disorders.Key Motivations: Want to express themselves and their individuality, to create and surround themselves with beauty, to maintain certain moods and feelings, to withdraw to protect their self-image, to take care of emotional needs before attending to anything else, to attract a "rescuer". Examples : urlLink Ingmar Bergman , urlLink Alan Watts , urlLink Sarah McLachlan , urlLink Alanis Morrisette , urlLink Paul Simon , Jeremy Irons, urlLink Patrick Stewart , Joseph Fiennes, urlLink Martha Graham , urlLink Bob Dylan , urlLink Miles Davis , urlLink Johnny Depp , urlLink Anne Rice , urlLink Rudolph Nureyev , urlLink J.D. Salinger , urlLink Anaîs Nin , urlLink Marcel Proust , urlLink Maria Callas , urlLink Tennessee Williams , urlLink Edgar Allan Poe , urlLink Annie Lennox , urlLink Prince , urlLink Michael Jackson , urlLink Virginia Woolf , urlLink Judy Garland , "Blanche DuBois" ( urlLink Streetcar Named Desire ).

Something I read this morning and found it quite cool... i'll share it cos it's my blog and I can... "Woven into our pressing daily concerns is the semi-conscious practice of dwelling in the glories, miseries, or should've-dones of the past, and the specualation, worries, or fantasies of the future. Whether innocuous daydream or obsesive anxiety, this kind of stepping out of the moment is an all too-human coping mechanism that helps us handle the risks and dissapointments we face each day-sometimes avoiding them altogether. And that's not a good thing. As different as these two kinds of mental departures are, both share an opposite that's nothing but a good thing. Let's call it Now. Now is paying attention to what's happening in and around us, and letting it inform and inspire us. Now is really listening to a conversation, even an internal one, or at least realizing we're not. Now is acknowledging the generations before and after us even as we claim this moment for ourselves." Weekend: Friday: Napoleon Dynamite redux. Saw this movie once more with a friend who hadn't seen it..this time around it was flippin' sweeter than the first time around...laughs abound. Got some dinner at Sette Osteria in Dupont Circle.. found the cuisine to be average at best..if you live in DC and want pasta, stick to Pasta Mia. If yer the pizza kind, stick with either Pizzeria Paradiso or Two Amy's.... lovely night altogether... Saturday: Made the mistake of renting a film called "Eurotrip", I should've known better...but hey..sometimes you need to kill 2 hours of yer day unproductively. So has anyone out there ever tried Absinthe?? it's illegal here in the US but it's all the rage with the clubgoers in Europe..I was gonna try some in Prague but never got to it as I fell terribly ill for some 2 days while there... good times tho', Prague is fookin breathtaking. Later that night we went to a party organized by Reg and MaTe... good times.. got knackered with Jell-O shots.. them thingy's are too fookin tasty and easy to drink for my own good...but they had Presidente's and fried Cheeseballs.. I'm a sucker fer them tasty critters... Sunday: laundry, the single man's nemesis. Finally got around to seeing Kill Bill V.2. It's out on DVD so if you've been a late bloomer to it like me go and check it out..excellent really. On the table for this week: Rehearsal tonight, Softball match tomorrow, B-day on Wednesday...Thu, TGIF, Sat. & Sun are still up fer grabs... Tasty drinks: taken without permission (as if I needed some) from La cuadratecnica & La vida negra (cuadratecnia.blogspot.com & lavidanegra.blogspot.com respectively.. ASTRONAUTA. Aquí están los ingredientes e instrucciones: una tajada de limón vodka azúcar café molido En un plato pones azúcar y café, sin mezclar, una mitad del plato para azúcar y otra para el café. Tomas el limón y lo situas ahí donde el azúcar y el café se juntan. En el limón al igual que el plato tienes un lado con azúcar y otro con café. Muerdes el limón y le sacas todo el jugo pero SIN TRAGAR, te debes quedar con ese berunte en boca. Si te lo tragas tienes que comenzar de nuevo. Te das tu shot de vodka y en tu boca juntas la vodka con el café, limón y azúcar y después tragas. Increíble. Después de dos estas jodió' . ELECTRIC BLUE. Se prepara en batidora. 1 medida de ron blanco 1 medida de jugo de piña ½ de MALIBÚ ½ de curaçao azul Hielo picado Se echan todos los ingredientes y se sirve frappé en vaso alto.Este trago está diseñado para funcionar ... cheers !!! Chingon Music.. Si alquilan el DVD de Kill Bill Vol.2 veran la banda de Robert Rodriguez director de "Desperado" y "El Mariachi"... pues el cuate es duro al machu tocando guitarra... y toca par de rancheras "chingonizadas"..vale la pena chequear.. Me entere por medio de la vida negra que hay un nuevo Monopolio...vayan a su site a ver la reseña con fotos y mas detalles..pero en resumen: Ghettopoly, el nuevo monopolio Cuando nunca pensamos que el juego del Monopolio podia ser superado llega esto: Ghettopoly Comprar propiedades robadas, tener cueros trabajando para ti y construir casas de crack nunca habia sido tan divertido, todo la familia puede disfrutar de este tremendo juego basado en el clasico de Parker Brothers, Arca Comunal y Casualidad? ningun problema, tenemos Hustle y Ghetto Stash para ti, las propiedades? La Bodega de Chico, el Westside Liquor Store, La Tienda de Masajes de Ling Ling entre otras. Bajo la recomendacion del tio Oz estoy escuchando Indie 103.1 , excelente! urlLink http://indie103.fm/main.html Eso es todo...la verdad que esto es mas facil que mandar 15 e-mails repitiendome...que tengan un buen Lunes... besos, Yo.

"If time is my vessel, then learning to love might be my way back to sea..." Just wanna give a shout-out' to whoever killed and cooked the first pig. Just came back from lunch...had a pulled pork sandwich....and goddammit! that was a tasty beast... if I had a pigpen, would you be my slut?? Today will be a slow day on the blog as I'm coming down with a sore throat and am getting into another one of my mood swings (har har)... anywho... I heard the new Interpol video for the song "Slowhands" is outstanding and a Postal Service video for a cover of "Against all Odds" is coming soon ... so keep an eye out for them... Had band practice yesterday..we worked on some 3 rather decent ideas..time will tell if they become songs or not...one of the ideas reminds me of our last song "Love Lies Bleeding".. but it's got more bounce and a wee more dynamics with some 3 different drumbeats running through.. it may turn out to be a dancey tune... the other song reminds me of Wilco's "I'm trying to break your heart"...it's pulsing and has only 2 or 3 root notes played the whole way through...then it kind of deconstructs itself in a wall of effects, guitars and keyboards...I keep playing much of the same thing throughout the song giving the tune it's backbone..just as I like it...sitting in the pocket...now I can't recall the 3rd song... Mark and Ed got aggravated with me last night.. Ed made me sit outside on the steps...it was good..I hate post rehearsal babble...so I grin like a fool..and that aggravates them more... it's an exercise in patience for them really.. if I could step outside myself I wonder if I'd actually like me... I definitely would, but not all the time...people can be so unpleasant... Gotta see Kill Bill Vol.2 sometime this weekend.. would like to catch up on some releases such as Open Water and Maria Full of Grace...can't wait till the Motorcycle Diaries and the new Almodovar hit theatres...Gael Garcia is supposed to be outstanding on both..on the former he plays El Che, on the latter he plays a tranny of some sort... versatile chap that one...not to mention the kudos he gets on my part for dating the luvely Natalie Portman..and she's jewish (take that as you want)....got a party tomorrow..we're supposed to dress in animal couture whatever the hell that means...I'll be mr. sourgrapes and bypass de shtick of the event...it's not like men are supposed to have zebra stripped tops or leopard thongs..wait, scratch that...some do. I've got a mouth full of cookies (for you and for me).. Chokomenta takes you places, yeah maybe to the beach, when your friends say you come crying tell them now your pleasure's set upon slow release (for you and for me)..man I need to leave this place faster than Paris Hilton's panties leave her thighs...till monday...or earlier....or never....or later.. In the words of Jose Miel's theme song: "itakuchi-no-oka.. yoko-ni-aru...tamayoho-aleru-ni"

Nelton ha acertado al informarme que tambien falta informacion sobre Centella y Fantasmagorico. La ultima vez que vi a Centella fue en el malecon en el Carnaval del 89'...recuerdo que en aquel entonces se veia muy fuera de forma y su motor no se veia a la altura de un superheroe...mi mama me dijo que eran ideas mias.

Mientras veia el magnifico recuento sobre el festival de los robots y otros muñequitos de infancia aqui donde urlLink El Bofe , no pude dar por desapercibido la ausencia de otros 3 grandes heroes/villanos: 1- "Sam el Rey del Judo": Joven audaz que lucho y mato a todo hombre tuerto que se interpuso en su camino durante la busqueda del tuerto que mato a su padre . El mismo Sam que mientras dirigia su Sanyang en el desierto nos dejaba con una moraleja sobre el capitulo del dia. A veces pienso que Sam fue creado por Quentin Tarrantino..pero no es el estilo de Tarrantino tener personajes secundarios como el perro "Boby" y el chamaquito intrometido "Kent". Tengo entendido que en la Republica ha habido un episodio veridico semejante entre el judoka Vicbart Geraldino y el Ing. Jaime Casanova... 2- El Superagente Cobra. Aquel superagente del brazo removible y la "psico-arma secreta". Aquel Cobra que pulia con mujeres animadas...quien no recuerda a "Dominic" en bikini?? aquel Cobra que nos trajo un juego aun mas violento que el balonazo y el burrito,Combinado!!!: el "Roughball". Despues de hacer una aparición en el video "Girlfriend" de Matthew Sweet el superagente Cobra no ha vuelto a ser visto..cualquier informacion dejenme saber. 3- La langosta Malvada que tanto atormento a los habitantes del estanque donde moraba la ranita Demetán. Cuantas veces no tomo la langosta en sus muelas la flauta de Demetán y amenazo con sodomizarlo como solo se ve en las fotos de la prision Abu Gharib? Lo ultimo que supe de la Langosta fue que termino en una Lasagna de "Neptuno's". Dicen las malas lenguas que una noche, al llegar embriagado de los bonches, la ranita Demetán se orino en los ojos de su novia...dejandola ciega, tal y como en los mitos de infancia. El acto deprimio tanto a Demetán que lo llevo al suicidio, bajo la goma de un camión. Su ex-novia, aunque ciega, dio a luz a 600 gusarapitos. Las malas lenguas tambien dicen que los gusarapos son hijos de la Langosta.. Y para que no digan que su tio Fico nunca ha hecho nada por ustedes: Para las chicas: -Vendo hermoso set de Candy Candy en DVD, etc...Publicado por CandyMan en fecha 08/08/04 Hola amigos,Vendo un hermoso set de Candy Candy en 10 DVDs...calidad es muy buena. Tomando de Bolivision a DVD. (Aparentemente ahora fue que Candy Candy llego a Bolivia) Puedes ver el set en esta pagina:http://www.animeretro.com/index.html -CANDY CANDY EN DVD Publicado por MARIELA en fecha 08/03/04HOLA YO LE COMPRE A UN CHICO Y ME LA MANDO A FRANCIA SU CORREO ES DJJLR@HOTMAIL.COMES SUPER HONESTO Y LA CALIDAD ES BUENA Para los chicos: http://www.astrolabio.net/contactos/

Not Yogi, but definitely smarter than the average bear... the kinda bear Cindy Bear should be bedding... urlLink http://www.cnn.com/2004/US/West/08/18/bear.beer.reut/index.html Me acuerdo cuando te entregaste a mi, me acuerdo como me aferraba yo a ti,acuerdo los dos soñando en una noche de pasión, hoy no escuchas no me miras se remuerde mi corazón. urlLink http://www.vicoc.jesusanswers.com/ Martiiiiiinnnnn Kadaragiaaaaan urlLink http://www.titanesenlared.com.ar/indexa.htm It comes out every thursday...I strongly recommend checking out the archives.. urlLink http://www.thestranger.com/current/savage.html En la misma vena de Fred Savage (aka Kevin Arnold) y Dustind Diamond (Samuel "Screech Powers")...hay quienes tardan mucho en hacerse hombres/mujeres/indecisos.. urlLink http://www.listin.com.do/cuerpos/espectaculos/esp2.htm y pensar que en las Olimpiadas Rock de hace algunos 10 años Herm(p)es (aka Nuria) nos introdujo como "Rostros", una banda que busca "mostrar las diferentes caras de lo sociedad.."..nos fue mal ese dia, en los historiales de las Olimpiadas solo una banda fue peor que nosotros: "Lechugas Frescas", lidereada por urlLink http://www.uepa.com/content/sections/album%20de%20fotos/templates/detail/verfoto_Album.asp?ids=19&ida=242&idImage=1945&o=forward Como siempre, no olviden visitar el site de mi banda rocanrolera: urlLink www.carteldc.com I'll renew my objection to this pointless endeavour, informally now, by affidavit later *poof*!

Ahhhh la nostalgia: urlLink http://www.titanesenlared.com.ar/davidelpastor.htm urlLink http://www.titanesenlared.com.ar/tiorico.htm urlLink http://www.titanesenlared.com.ar/capitan_zum.htm urlLink http://www.titanesenlared.com.ar/dink-c.htm urlLink http://www.titanesenlared.com.ar/elejecutivo.htm urlLink http://www.titanesenlared.com.ar/el_hombre_de_la_laguna.htm urlLink http://www.titanesenlared.com.ar/vegetal.htm urlLink http://www.titanesenlared.com.ar/olimpico.htm urlLink http://www.titanesenlared.com.ar/jupiter.htm y lista sigue en: urlLink http://www.titanesenlared.com.ar/luchadores.htm

La idea es darles un vistazo de lo que vive dentro mi cabeza. No todo lo entenderan, a veces yo mismo no me entiendo. Leerse mis obras los ayudara: 1-"Cultura-Pop para los nacidos entre el 1982-1987: Candy Candy, Super Pan, Odissea Burbujas y Chiquilladas para una Generacion" (El Antiguo Testamento) 2-"Si mi Chimi lleva Bacon, tu Yun-Yun lleva Azucar: experiencias culinarias Pre-PicaLonga" (Nuevo Testamento) Se les ama a todos. Si no lo sienten, Mi corazón esta en huelga. Besos, Yo.

And here I am... following the steps of the mighty Oz and the ever unruly Nelton... I shall get the hang of this soon enough...and when I do, beware...cos if reading my blog don't get yer attention, I'll stick my fist up yer arse like my name was Jim Henson. Until Post #2, Fico.

urlLink I don’t look the same in the photograph/I need to look the way I did in the photograph/By mentioning places it will all become clear/If we speak the same language, you’re a deeper darker reason...
